about_the_game:
Hoodgang simulator — Where Life Unfolds Freely
In hoodgang simulator, a magical journey is waiting for you.

Game Elements:
This game is a brilliant canvas where you're the artist. Every character, every machine, even every building is either AI-generated or custom-made by you - right down to dynamic voxel graphics that provide an incredibly immersive and vivid experience.

The NPCs in this open-world environment aren’t just NPCs. They're like living, breathing citizens, capable of remembering their interactions and relationships with you as well as your behavioral patterns, making the game significantly more realistic and life-like.

Life at Your Fingertips:
Experience the thrill and energy of city life. Visit the local gym and hone your fighting skills, get a fresh new look at the barber shop, stay in vogue with the latest fashion from clothing stores, or customize your favorite ride at the vehicle mod shop.

Thrilling Battles:
Whether it's a pulsating race with your friends or intense deathmatches in solo or team modes, suffice to say, things are going to get heated. These duels and contests take place across painstakingly designed races and venues, just waiting to get discovered. From the heart of the city to the remotest suburbs, from towering skyscrapers to expansive off-road tracks, every corner is a potential battlefield.

Protagonist-specific Skills:
Your character isn’t just an ordinary one. It can not only improve basic attributes but also learn and practice a variety of skills such as weapon handling or vehicle driving. Moreover, you can delve into simulation skills like cooking your own food, painting your masterpiece, or playing a serenade – each of these life skills making your character incredibly authentic and rich.

content_descriptors.notes: Some weapons and firearms may appear in the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 3.2 GHz / AMD A8-7600 APU 3.1 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line)
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: An open world game crafted in an artistic voxel style. Riveting in a resplendent American metropolis, players can take on a wide array of tasks, trigger random events, or relish the thrill of blazing races and intriguing shootouts.
